Hi,
in my opinion this is easily achievable by disabling all writers(so no =
ARC/WARC writers).
The information you want is in the crawl.log.

Gabriel V=
asile

European Archive

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Federico M=
aggi 
  To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday,24 June, 2010=
 7:24 PM
  Subject: [archive-crawler] Heritrix for writing extracted URIs r=
ather than ARCs


    
  Hello,
  since (1) we do not have enough space for=
 archiving the whole crawled material and (2) we don't really need everythi=
ng, I am trying to accomplish the following task.

  All I need to write is=
 the extracted URIs along with the URI they appear into. For example, I wou=
ld like to modify (or configure) Heritrix to write _only_ the following inf=
ormation in a simple flat file:

  http://example.net http://example.com/a/=
uri/found/there
  http://example.net http://example.com/some/other/uri/foun=
d/there
  http://example.com http://example.com/some/other/uri/found/there
=
  ...

  How can this be accomplished?

  Thanks in advance. Best regards,
=
  -- Federico
